| History                 = The Skulls are a white supremacist prison gang active in the [[Cage (Prison)|Cage]] that worshippd the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]]. It was led by a man called Aryan and according to [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]], compared to them, Skinheads were like Catholic schoolgirls. The gang attempted to collect on the bounty put on the temporarily de-powered and incarcerated Wolverine and the [[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Beast]] by the mutant hating Warden and guards.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 164}}
